Text: We made it without incident!
(Where am I...?)
...Long-distance travel is a hassle...

This distance is a hassle to you because you're
always cooped up.

...Doesn't matter the distance. For starters...
traveling itself is a hassle...
(I'm back here... The artifact was used again...)

(It looks like we've arrived at the base in town.
According to Eta's explanation, this point is the
save point...)

(Although Eta herself probably doesn't remember
explaining the artifact to me...)

(Claire Kagenou... She looks unwell, but she's
alive.)

(It's a strange feeling seeing someone alive who was
supposed to have died in front of me. The notion of
not having to fear death...)
(That's right...!)
Where is Gamma? Where is she?
Lady Alpha? What's wrong?

Gamma went to check out the warehouse. That dumb dog
ran off chasing boars during a time like this. What
an idiot.
...Where is the warehouse?
Do you need something from Gamma?

I need to discuss the details about Shadow's
resurrection with her. She needs to hear this too.

Master Shadow's...! How exactly will he be
resurrected?!
I'll explain that once everyone has gathered—
Lady Alpha!
I caught a wild boar! It's food!

...Well done, Delta. I'm stepping out for a bit, so
stay put here.
Huh? Lady Alpha, where are you going?
To the warehouse. Gamma is there.
Warehouse? Gamma? But I smell Gamma nearby.
*gasp*
Around there—
(It can't be...!)
Lady Alpha?
Ack...!
Not happening.
What's going on?
Lady Alpha blocked an attack... Wait, is that...?
Gamma...?

What's with that look? Why do you have such
malevolent magic...?

And why the sword? What were you planning to do with
that sword?!
(I'd hoped my fear was unfounded.)

(Gamma had already become like this before the save
point was established...)

Why...was I blocked...even with this power...? Am I
still the weakest...?
It can't be... It can't be true...!

I was supposed to have become the strongest...!
Capable of destroying everything...!

No matter how much a genius you are, if you get
stabbed in the heart with a sword, you'll die! Even
a baby should know that!
Am I weaker than a baby?! A-A babyyyy!!!
Huh?! Gamma, stop!

Ack... What strength... This Gamma is incomparable
to who she was before...!
Grrr... You've got some nerve, Gamma...!

All of you are always mocking me... I won't forgive
you!

(There's nothing we can do about events that
occurred before the save point...)

(It's the same as Shadow's death... Until we get the
time leap artifact, there's no going back...)

Ahahahaha! Haha, hahahaha! Blow away that genius'
heart!!!

Reddish-black magic... It seems the demonization has
begun.

Hmph, ridiculous. It's just a rampage of magic.
There's no meaning in power that can't be
controlled.

You say that, yet that power is exactly what we
seek. Let's rejoice in this moment.

Do not take your eyes off the events that unfold.
With that power, the day when our sublime goals will
be realized is nigh—
